abstract: Chinese officials raid offices of leading human rights organization Beijing Yirenping Center in latest sign of crackdown on activism.
lead_paragraph: Employees say the police raided the Beijing Yirenping Center, which champions gender equality and fights discrimination against people with H.I.V., hepatitis and physical disabilities.

headline.main: China Raids Offices of Rights Group as Crackdown on Activism Continues
headline.print_headline: In Crackdown, China Officials Raid Offices of Rights Group

snippet: Employees say the police raided the Beijing Yirenping Center, which champions gender equality and fights discrimination against people with H.I.V., hepatitis and physical disabilities.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
